member.name: DRAWTEXTPARAMS
member.summary: The DRAWTEXTPARAMS structure contains extended formatting options for the function.

member.name: DRAWTEXTPARAMS.iTabLength
member.summary: The size of each tab stop, in units equal to the average character width.

member.name: DRAWTEXTPARAMS.iLeftMargin
member.summary: The left margin, in units equal to the average character width.

member.name: DRAWTEXTPARAMS.iRightMargin
member.summary: The right margin, in units equal to the average character width.

member.name: DRAWTEXTPARAMS.uiLengthDrawn
member.summary: Receives the number of characters processed by , including white-space characters. The number can be the length of the string or the index of the first line that falls below the drawing area. Note that DrawTextEx always processes the entire string if the DT_NOCLIP formatting flag is specified.
